gcci.text: At an average H100 price of $3.15/hr, the GPU market shows easing supply yet still faces constrained availability and high capex demands that slow capacity additions.

gtpi.text: With an average input price of $1.25/1M tokens, the API market is deep in a price war that rewards efficiency gains and spurs model competition to compress costs.

gagl.text: An annual AI load of 120 TWh intensifies grid strain, accelerating nuclear adoption as a low‑carbon baseload option and driving renewable integration to reduce carbon footprint.

aipi.text: Industry sentiment remains optimistic but faces bubble risks from rising capex and token price compression, while efficiency improvements and demand growth sustain the long‑term trajectory.
